page.title: 07WADWORTH MAYPOLE
page.content: My name is Abigail Haigh and this year I was elected to be{May Queen}at our annual Maypole Celebration. Before the event parents make items for the craft stalls, the float is decorated,dresses are made and dances practised. On the day itself all is bright and colourful and everyone is dressed in their best white clothes. At half past two all the excitement turned me into a bundle of nerves with the horrifying thought of so many people watching me. We climbed onto the float and a band led us around the village. On our return I was crowned beneath the{garlanded pole. With my attendants I went round the circle throwing flower petals to the crowd before watching the rest of the school dance. Ribbons twirled and music played. At last we trooped into school and the enjoyed looking at all the stalls and eating candyfloss.
